bootstrap/Makefile - pgsql17devel-backend

  1. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------
  2. #
  3. # Makefile for the bootstrap module
  4. #
  5. # src/backend/bootstrap/Makefile
  6. #
  7. #-------------------------------------------------------------------------

  9. subdir = src/backend/bootstrap
  10. top_builddir = ../../..
  11. include $(top_builddir)/src/Makefile.global

  13. override CPPFLAGS := -I. -I$(srcdir) $(CPPFLAGS)

  15. OBJS = \
  16.     bootparse.o \
  17.     bootscanner.o \
  18.     bootstrap.o

  20. include $(top_srcdir)/src/backend/common.mk

  22. # See notes in src/backend/parser/Makefile about the following two rules
  23. bootparse.h: bootparse.c
  24.     touch $@

  26. bootparse.c: BISONFLAGS += -d

  28. # Force these dependencies to be known even without dependency info built:
  29. bootparse.o bootscanner.o: bootparse.h

  31. clean:
  32.     rm -f bootparse.c \
  33.           bootparse.h \
  34.           bootscanner.c
